comments:
I20070320-0100 with Mylar 3.3 M5 loaded

I have been running the UI test suites with Mylar loaded and the tear down methods  are getting Widget is disposed exceptions an asyncs are being run after workbench shutdown.

A WorkbenchJob is generally a safer way of doing this than an async as they do not run when there is no workbench.

STEPS
1) Load org.eclipse.ui.tests from the test repository
2) Run org.eclipse.ui.tests.api.IWorkbenchTest as a JUnit plug-in test
3) testOpenWorkbenchWindow2 will log the following error on shutdown

org.eclipse.swt.SWTException: Widget is disposed

*** Bug 178330 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

Thanks Tod.  This should be fixed now, but I haven't verified yet.  The latest here:
* http://download.eclipse.org/technology/mylar/update-site/dev/e3.3
* or from HEAD: http://wiki.eclipse.org/index.php/Mylar_Contributor_Reference#Checkout

If you see any related failures please reopen.  Btw, I also noticed this start happening late yesterday with I20070321-1300.  

Also, thanks for the tip on WorkbenchJob, I didn't know about that and it will get rid of a lot of checks to see if widgets are disposed or if the platform is running.  I've posted this to our guidelines.
